item.description:
Want to turn over a new leaf this fall? Join dietitian Jessica Jones-Hughes for a conversation about finding physical well-being in the garden. Following the discussion, weâ€™ll learn to make delicious, time-saving meals with garden harvests that your family will love.

This workshop is a part of Tastes of the Garden and Seed Sow & Grow workshop series.

The event is FREE and open to the public however, registration is required.To register, call 617-542-7696 or email info@bostonnatural.org
item.how_to_find_us: City Natives is a short walk from the Mattapan MBTA Station (Red Line) and Blue Hill Avenue bus lines. Parking is available along Edgewater Drive.
item.name: Find Health in The Garden
